item.title: DefectDojo API v2
item.description: DefectDojo's API is created using Django Rest Framework. The documentation of each endpoint is available within each DefectDojo installation at /api/v2/oa3/swagger-ui and can be accessed by choosing the API v2 Docs link on the user drop down menu in the header.
